headers: REFERENCE AD CREATIVE STRATEGY — EMMA RELIEF

rows.REFERENCE AD CREATIVE STRATEGY — EMMA RE: How Emma runs ads. How IonWave must run ads.

rows.col_2: Dozens of active creatives at any time. Constantly testing new hooks, angles, formats. Public ad library shows massive creative volume.
rows.col_3: Same: high-volume creative testing. Minimum 5 new hooks per 2-week cycle. Use VSL Testing Protocol L1.

rows.col_2: Dr. Gina Sam — real gastroenterologist. Doctor in white coat. "Doctors Endorsed" on Amazon listing. Medical authority = trust for health claims.
rows.col_3: Need authority figure: sports nutritionist, exercise physiologist, or doctor. Real credential, real person. Not optional for supplement DR.

rows.col_2: Heavy UGC rotation. Real customers sharing stories. Before/after framing. "I was skeptical but..." format.
rows.col_3: Same: UGC pipeline from day one. Contract 5-10 UGC creators. Testimonial-first creative for warm audiences.

rows.col_2: Ads that look like content, not ads. "This gut doctor says stop taking probiotics" — curiosity + contrarian + authority.
rows.col_3: Same: "Your sports drink is dehydrating you" — contrarian + authority. Ads that educate, not sell.

rows.col_2: "Methane gas is rotting your gut from the inside." Graphics of bloated intestines. Medical imagery. Creates urgency through fear of inaction.
rows.col_3: Softer version: dehydration causing cramps, fatigue, poor recovery. Athletic performance loss. Still problem-agitation, less fear-based.

rows.col_2: Static images, short video (15-30s), long-form VSL clips, carousel, UGC clips. Tests across all formats.
rows.col_3: Same: test all formats. Lead with short video hooks. Scale winners into longer cuts. Use VSL footage for clip variants.

rows.col_2: Ad library sorted by total impressions = highest performing ads are visible. Tells you what’s winning.
rows.col_3: Study their top-impression ads weekly. Reverse-engineer hooks, angles, CTAs. Adapt for electrolytes.
